abstract: Senator John F. Kerry's top foreign policy adviser is hired by Tony Podesta's lobbying firm, as another Congressional staff member moves to K Street.
snippet: Senator John F. Kerry's top foreign policy adviser is hired by Tony Podesta's lobbying firm, as another Congressional staff member moves to K Street.
lead_paragraph: The revolving door between Capitol Hill and K Street swept up another influential name on Monday, as the top foreign policy adviser to Senator John F. Kerry joined Tony Podesta's lobbying shop.
